metadata.title: SEGRILA Women’s Sports Bras 3 Pack Crisscross Back Yoga Bras Medium Support Workout Bras with Removable Pads
features: 【High Quality Breathable Material】92% Nylon,8% Spandex. Moisture-wicking, Chafe-Resistant and Stretchy Breathable Fabric, helps keep you cool and dry.
【All-around Comfort】4-Way Stretch fabric flexes to fit for all-around comfort, proper amount of compression holds everything in place and provide support.
【Seamless and Crisscross Back Design】The Crossback and double shoulder straps give you a signature stylish look. Seamless and tag-less to prevent irritation.
【Easy Use】Pull-On closure for easy use, removable padded foam cups for optional added support.
【Many Occasions】Perfect support for light and medium impact activity, like yoga, pilates, jogging, biking, bowling, dance, walking, fitness classes, gym workout, or daily use.
description: Segrila Seamless Crisscross Back Sports Bras for Women 3 Pack Feature ✿ Pull-On closure ✿ Crisscross back design ✿ Removable pads ✿ Seamless look ✿ You can wear this everyday sports bra on its own at the gym, workouts, yoga, or beneath any top while out and about or lounging around Tips for washing:Machine washable, pads only can be washed by hand, hang to dry. Tips for easy pad removal : ( 1 ) Fold the pad into half inside the slot. ( 2 ) Carefully pull it out through the opening along the seam.
